sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Coin.css"; const Coin = ({ name, image, price, volume, symbol, priceChange, marketcap, coinrank, }) => { return (

{name}

{symbol}

# {coinrank}

Price:

${price}

Volume:

${volume.toLocaleString()}

Change in 24h:

{priceChange < 0 ? (

{priceChange.toFixed(2)}%

) : (

{priceChange.toFixed(2)}%

)}

Mkt. Cap:

${marketcap.toLocaleString()}

); }; export default Coin;
